description: Synthwave User Portal - A Python Flask-based web application running on localhost:3000 providing user authentication, registration, and profile management functionality. The application is built with Werkzeug 3.1.3 and includes HTML API documentation exposed in page comments.
notes: Main web application entry point. Root path (/) redirects to /login when not authenticated. Application enforces authentication for protected endpoints like /profile. Werkzeug is the development/built-in production WSGI server for Flask applications. Static CSS files served from /static/ directory.
